modules.description: This module constructs `.install` files for opam packages by translating OASIS build configurations into installable items. It defines functions to declare libraries, objects, executables, and files with their installation paths and sections. Users can generate opam-compatible installation manifests directly from OASIS project definitions.

This module enhances OCamlbuild with specialized hooks for dependency tracking, custom rule application, and predicate handling. It works directly with OCamlbuild's plugin system and build hooks. Use it to streamline builds by improving handling of external dependencies, customizing cmxs generation, and propagating predicates to ocamldep.
